description:
This course is designed for:

  • Those who is interested in learning Chinese but has little or no proficiency in Chinese.
  • The course is focus on common conversation.
  • Through out these common conversation, students will be able to use them right away in real life.
  • Students will develop the basic communication skills through listening and speaking.
  • Each section, instructor will also breakdown the conversation in order to be detailing the vocabulary and sentence patterns.
  • Chinese culture and etiquette are also introduced through out the lessons.
  • Student will have chance to learn the differences,and,or similarity of the western culture and Chinese culture.
title: Dream, Learn, Excercise in Chinese
